tp:property.name: childCount
tp:property.tp:docstring: The number of children contained by this object.

method.name: getChildren
method.tp:docstring: Get the Accessible children of this object.

arg.tp:docstring: The Accessible children of this object.

method.name: getChildAtIndex
method.tp:docstring: Get the accessible child of this object at index.

arg.name: index
arg.tp:docstring: An parameter indicating which child is requested (zero-indexed).
The 'nth' Accessible child of this object.
